unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a "3 Idiots" Level Makeover in Pune!**
normalised: **Electric Vehicle Charging Gets a "Three Idiots" Level Makeover in Pune!**

unnormalised: Pune – Forget the 'Circuit' style jugaad, folks! IIT-Pune researchers are cooking up some seriously cool tech to make EV charging faster and cheaper. We're talking a potential game changer for the Indian EV scene, especially for those long highway trips to Goa!
normalised: Pune – Forget the 'Circuit' style jugaad, folks! Indian Institute of Technology-Pune researchers are cooking up some seriously cool tech to make Electric Vehicle charging faster and cheaper. We're talking a potential game changer for the Indian Electric Vehicle scene, especially for those long highway trips to Goa!

unnormalised: Imagine zipping down the Mumbai-Pune expressway without range anxiety hanging over your head like Gabbar Singh.
normalised: Imagine zipping down the Mumbai-Pune expressway without range anxiety hanging over your head like Gabbar Singh.

unnormalised: The IIT team is developing a next-gen charging system that promises to slash charging times by up to 40% and reduce infrastructure costs by, say, Rs. 20,000 per charging point. This is no "All is Well" mantra, but real, tangible innovation.
normalised: The Indian Institute of Technology team is developing a next-gen charging system that promises to slash charging times by up to forty percent and reduce infrastructure costs by, say, rupees twenty thousand per charging point. This is no "All is Well" mantra, but real, tangible innovation.

unnormalised: They're also working on making charging more accessible in rural areas, where getting juice for your EV is harder than finding a decent vada pav stand after 10 pm.
normalised: They're also working on making charging more accessible in rural areas, where getting juice for your Electric Vehicle is harder than finding a decent vada pav stand after ten post meridiem.

unnormalised: Testing is happening right now near Hinjewadi, so keep an eye out for some seriously futuristic-looking setups. We're hoping this puts India on the EV innovation map for good! With this we should be able to do Mumbai-Pune-Mumbai (around 300 km) in one charge comfortably.
normalised: Testing is happening right now near Hinjewadi, so keep an eye out for some seriously futuristic-looking setups. We're hoping this puts India on the Electric Vehicle innovation map for good! With this we should be able to do Mumbai-Pune-Mumbai (around three hundred kilometer) in one charge comfortably.

unnormalised: And hey, maybe this will finally convince Sharmaji down the street to ditch his fuel guzzler for an electric rickshaw!
normalised: And hey, maybe this will finally convince Sharmaji down the street to ditch his fuel guzzler for an electric rickshaw!
